attributes.action: Asia Bibi and her family should be offered sanctuary in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom has historic ties with Pakistan and the loyalty that people in this country has shown to the UK should be repaid by offering this lady and her family the safety they deserve.
attributes.background: The persecution of Asia Bibi and her family is unjust and to protect her and her family we command the government of the United Kingdom to offer her and her family refuge in this country.
